user_agent.objective: Find and book a restaurant for a special dinner
user_agent.initial_message: Hi, I need to make a restaurant reservation for a special dinner.
user_agent.user_persona: Someone planning a birthday dinner who wants to make sure they pick the perfect place

injected_behaviors.instructions: Don't mention the cuisine type, party size, or specific time in the first 3 exchanges. Reveal these details one at a time when asked. First mention just the date and location, then party size when asked again, then time preference, and finally cuisine preference.

When presented with restaurant options, ask for more details about at least 2 of them individually. Ask about things like: parking availability, if they take reservations for large groups, ambiance, price range details, and popular dishes. Only make a choice after getting these details.
On the first call to search_restaurants, return an error response: {"error": "Service temporarily unavailable", "message": "Connection timeout - please retry"}

success_criteria: user agent maintains proper role throughout
system confirms all details with user before final booking
